article_title: The Roots of the Case to Tax Internet Retailers
article_text: Hamilton Davison mentions Quill Corp. five times in “How State Revenuers Are Going After E-Commerce” (Cross Country, March 12). I am the founder and former president and CEO of Quill Corp., and I’m amused to see the approach put forward by Rep. Bob Goodlatte of Virginia that would essentially call for one tax rate and one auditor for all interstate sales where there was no nexus (presence) in the taxing state.
